Text:
Absolutely priceless! Thank you so much.

I have a lot of Clapton on vinyl, 4 track, C/D & DVD but this discography makes everything complete.

What I've DL'd & listen to so far is flawless.

Even tough my upload is slow, I will share a 2:1 minimum. Thanks again for this.
thank you for such variety but this torrent drove my itunes crazy so beware that youll have to fix a lot of stuff.
